title: Diffusion Processes on Manifolds
abstract: This is an informal introduction to stochastic analysis on both Riemannian and Lorentzian manifolds. We review the basics underlying the construction of diffusions on manifolds, highlighting the important differences between the Riemannian and Lorentzian cases. We also discuss a few recent applications which range from biophysics to cosmology.
